page.title: Covariance - Ecosystem Support Organization

content.text: The missing piece for Safe Ecosystem Grants Program
4. I understand that I will be required to provide additional KYC information to the Safe Foundation and to sign the KYC Agreement to receive this grant:
5. I understand that I have reviewed the
6. I understand that I will be expected to provide follow up grant reporting information to the Grants Council and Safe Forum

Covariance is growing a curated network of builders and business developer advocates who share a passion for unlocking value. We want to help projects solve well defined and measurable problems, by empowering contributors from varied networks to collaborate, ideate, and create value that otherwise would have not existed.
The Covariance model flow is simple:
(leverage Safe multi sig as a treasury for the campaign rewards)

We have identified, that a classic implementation of this general model fit in an Ecosystem Grant programs, where the foundation/ecosystem/DAO is seeding the "rewards", and the projects are the grantees. The goal is to provide grantees additional support beyond the funding to increase their chances of success and maximize the potential ROI for the ecosystem.
We propose to run an experiment of the Covariance model with Wave1 of the Safe grant program as a way to demonstrate the model.
What is the core value proposition of your project? Include details such as competitive analysis, comparable to similar projects and an emphasis on your key differentiators
The goal is to show the possibility of unlocking value in a scalable manner via the empowerment of community with structuring of incentive mechanism

An early stage project has various needs that can significantly impact their success, beyond just funding. Sometimes they know to highlight those needs, and sometimes an external party can highlight or identify it to reflect them.  Those needs could be in various domains. i.e :
1. Looking to onboard B2B customers to use
2. Looking to speak with potential design partners to use our solution
Looking to consult on our product tech stack design
5. Looking for help to review and improve our pitch for our fundraise campaign
6. Looking to consult with an experienced community builder how to activate our community

The traditional support model today rely on the builders own network, or the networks in which they are member of (accelerators, VC's, local community or other parties of interest), and are usually limited or constrained by the capacity of the organization.
Covariance could be seen as Platform as a Service model, in which opportunities are proactively surfaced, and then any community member is able to help and get rewarded if value was created.

On the supply side, the value proposition for contributors is to leverage their network and expertise beyond the standard full-time hiring model, get an opportunity to expand their network , and get exposure to the projects they help.
More about the reasoning in the
, and in these references about the
Does your project use any novel technology?
We intend to leverage on chain reputation and credentials networks such as POAP, Galxe, web3 social (Lens, Farcaster, Cyeberconnect).
What type of support are you looking for?
Add additional context here to type of support required

At this phase of validation of the concept, we are mostly focused to demonstrate how proactive identification of needs and involvement of community in support can open up opportunities that add value. On this key premise what we will most need is the support of the Safe ecosystem and team in utilizing
Please share your key documents and links
Since the project officially just started recently, here are some references of past work to demonstrated capability to deliver:
Overall positive feedback in the Safe forum from the community:
Success demonstration in taking an idea to a working MVP (#1 hackathon winner of Ocean Protocol Data Economy Challenge

Initiated and led the first ever ETHTLV week while working at Collider Venture - demonstration of a building a community from 0 to 1 - > now 500+ members , organized 25+ community led events during the week
About us page with more background
The product is currently in bootstrap phase to demonstrate the value proposition.
Name and role of team member(s)
Lior Goldenberg, project founder, and a gradually growing closed & gated community of early trusted supporters.
Please share your educational and professional background, years active, including all relevant experience

I'm a crypto & web3 geek, autodidact with diverse background that went from a comfortable c-level position in a US global corporate, to become a builder, DAO maximalist, investor, and a web3 social maxi. Passionate about the future of work, on-chain reputation networks, and  these days an entrepreneur, building Covariance network

In my previous life (pre-crypto), I served as a CFO at the HQ of a division of a global corporate (HP), overseeing a P&L of >$200M annual revenue, leading strategy, planning and FP&A for the business.
Left corporate in 2018 and fell in love with web3 and into the DAO rabbit hole in 2019 with

, where I lead Finance Operation and Legal for the project. This is when I established my deep conviction and belief in crypto, the power of community, and the promise of the technology to solve coordination problems at scale.
Led the formation of a hackathon team, ideation and architecture design of a concept for decentralized dataset collective called
. Hacked and won 1st place at Ocean Data Economy Challenge
Evolved into D2D growth contributor and BD lead during the DeFi summer with multiple DAO’s and communities.
as Head of Platform, leading post investment portfolio support, where I worked with
and spent 100’s of hours reviewing deal flow, meeting founders and builders in diverse segments of the market.
Tell us your most notable achievement
Nominated as CFO of an HP subsidiary overseeing $200M Pnl at age 31. Helped turn around a business and secure $80M+ R&D investments over 5 years.
Helped early stage projects close strategic partnerships with top 30 crypto projects
Ideate a project, assembled a team and won 1st prize at an Hackathon
How long and under what circumstances have team members known each other, and worked together? If you do not have any team members, please put N/A
I'm leading the assembly and nurturing of the community around the vision of Covariance - building a community led organization that lives by these 3 core values -

The current community composition is build upon my personal network of trusted web3 builders I met along a 5 years crypto journey, who share similar values and deep belief in the power of community to unlock value.
Please share why you / your team has the right background(s) to bring this idea to market. Include any aspects like domain expertise, years of experience, or published research.

I've been working with founders and crypto projects in the past 5 years in multiple domains and segments of the market. I've gathered insights that shaped my passion to take what I've been doing and build a better model.

Throughout my journey, I kept seeing how tremendous value is captured just due to failure of coordination. How a simple intro or a random chat leads to big opportunities, and how so many others are just not coming into fruition due to lack of coordination or access to knowledge, resources, and network.
These all ended up with me leaving my full time job this summer and starting
, where I’m dedicating 100% of my time to solve this one critical problem I kept facing throughout my journey:

How to scale value add & unlock opportunities that do not materialize due to gaps in coordination. How can we open up participation to anyone that is capable of helping in identifying opportunities or finding a solution to another founder or project problem , and allow that value to emerge, while letting anyone involved get a fair share of the value created.

I’m convinced that similar to how DeFi rails has done for on-chain liquidity and price discovery, the future of work will be based on on-chain reputation & talent networks that will help talent and opportunities flow in a frictionless way that maximize value creation in the ecosystem.
More about my thoughts on this area:
Tell us about your product development journey. Be sure to describe your product development to date (if any).
Only applicable for Build and Growth grants. Please put N/A otherwise.
In order to experiment with the proposed model for ecosystem support organization, we will follow 4 phases, and focus on evaluating following key questions
Are we able to identify opportunities and support projects via activation of ecosystem members?
Do builders value the support they receive?
Tell us your plan of implementation for your project
Tell us about your traction to date. if not applicable, add N/A
Include revenue, users, partnerships, integrations, and/or feedback you've received and incorporated
Met 100+ founders, teams, investors, business developers, sales people, marketers and other ecosystem participants  to collect feedback.
Gathered a small community to bootstrap the supply side.
Gained interest to explore the model as a new investment vehicle (led by sweat equity)
In conversations with Identified design partners to implement various functions of the model (Legal framework design, tokenization of agreements, on chain infra and more)
Include Safe-related metrics: TVL, transactions, volume, unique addresses
Include links to Dune, Etherscan, or any relevant platform showcasing your metrics
Please share details of any fundraising (from self or external parties). Have you raised prior funds from VCs, investors, or government agencies?
Have you received any prior grants / hackathon winnings / accelerator funds?
Tell us about your long-term vision

Similar to how DeFi rails has done for on-chain liquidity and price discovery, the future of work will be based on on-chain reputation & talent networks that will help talent and opportunities flow in a frictionless way that maximize value creation in the ecosystem.
Covariance will utilize these primitives to become the go-to place for high quality and vetted builders to find curated opportunities for the problems they face.

Business developers, sales people and anyone that has built a personal network will find Covariance as the place to find quality opportunities to support and gain upside exposure from the value they helped created.
What would be your biggest obstacle to get there?
Please tell us what you think would be the biggest challenge faced in order to achieve your project aspirations.
The ability to bootstrap a strong network of contributors and demonstrate the value proposition early on (the classic cold-start problem)

Another challenge is to get enough contributors onboard in the reduced budget vs. original plan. (if the project could be extended with additional ~$10,000-$15,000, it will allow us to double down on the supply side and boost communication, outreach and exposure the experiment gets (exposure to Safe grants program as well)
Outline the major deliverables of your project. Please only provide major deliverables as you will have the chance to provide milestones in Section 3.
What is your estimated timeline for completion of the project?
What is the size of funding you expect for completing each milestone of the project?
The above request reflect 50% of the requested budget, and the other 50% was originally requested in $SAFE tokens.

Due to lack of transferability of the $SAFE token, but the criticality of including a long-term upside reward in the program to align contributors <> protocol incentives, we propose the same approach taken in SEP#6 proposal {i.e - contributors are not guaranteed additional rewards beside the allocated budget / bounties bucket, but assume good faith of the DAO to support a retroactive $SAFE and pending ratification)
resource allocation framework" option proposed in the forum -
Here's a detailed breakdown of allocation of funds:
Please identify the key milestones that will help track the progress of your grant.
12. Please map out your project milestones in the table below. These milestones will provide the Safe Grants Council and Safe community with progress updates of your project.
, we note what we mean by Benchmark vs Critical categories. We state
, which categories need what milestone e.g.{Research} grants only need critical milestones.
Dashboard of opportunities & needs, KPIs, rewards
Provide a comprehensive description of the tasks and deliverables for Milestone 1.
Specify the anticipated outcomes and their significance for the successful completion of the project.
Meet with grants committee members to gather feedback & highlights on their observation as for which projects are mostly in need of support
Onboarding interview and understanding of the needs of 10 chosen grantees.
Based on the previous stages, analyze and narrow down to a short list of proposed projects to focus on in Wave1
Review together with the Safe Grant Committee and decide - Filter down to
Break down the needs to clear & measurable KPI’s
Document a request for proposals (RFP) document for each project
Decide how to allocate the reward bucket to the various needs identified
- not part of the grants program  (to demonstrate the use case of supporting projects directly)
Build the dashboard of opportunities & needs, KPIs, rewards
Build and define the process to apply and contribute towards solving the opportunities
Interview 5-10 key stakeholders to identify resources in the safe ecosystem (list of people to be determined in collaboration with the grant council)
Research - Contribution Measurement framework - Research available tools to evaluate and measure contributions during the campaign
Research potential tools & communities to use and reach out in order to echo the builders needs (map where and how we can best echo the needs identified to find relevant matches)
Promotion - Invite safe ecosystem members to participate in the experiment as contributors
Promotion - Invite external members of the community
Provide a comprehensive description of the tasks and deliverables for Milestone 2
Specify the anticipated outcomes and their significance for the successful completion of the project.
Launch of submission window for contributors
Actively push in the previously identified tools and communities to encourage submissions of opportunities for the KPI's
Resolution - Projects received the opportunities submitted and evaluate if they meet their expectations
Build an NPS conclusion survey to assess the success of the experiment
How are you planning to build or improve  Safe?
Develop an innovative use case for Safe vaults - every Covariance campaign is a potential vault, in which the potential rewards are locked and distributed to contributors upon completion
Demonstrating a new community-led support model that can help scale SGP and unlock opportunities to help grantees
Position the Safe Ecosystem Grants program as an innovative lighthouse for other ecosystem to adopt and learn from.
Try to detail out the plan to leverage the power of the Safe Ecosystem.

Upon mapping of needs on the grantees side, we will be looking to get as much exposure to the opportunity for community members to participate in helping them meet their KPI's. in order to do that we will be looking to
Present the opportunities on a community call.
Post on the forum or use the Safe ecosystem social accounts and other mediums to get as much exposure to the opportunities as possible
Why will this solution be a source of growth for the Safe ecosystem?
Because it works on both sides of the ecosystem:
It will allow Covariance to deliver more campaigns and continue build on Safe
It will encourage more builders to build similar models using Safe.
It will empower existing community to engage and support other builders in the ecosystem
It will bring new members that might find opportunities to contribute within the safe ecosystem
How does your project relate to account abstraction and smart accounts?

The core model of Covariance is built upon launching "campaign" - each campaign include several projects allocating rewards and locking them into a smart account, that under certain condition, unlocked and be distributed to contributors.
How will your project contribute to the expected benefit of the based on the amount given? Please refer to the breakdown below. For additional details on expected benefits, check ROIs per category in
- we are looking to build mechanism that use Safe as a cornerstone primitive to hold potential reward for contributors
we support builders and help increase their chances of success. Their success leads to more of their users and community using Safe.
supports the overarching goals in the Safe constitution:

- the core design of the Covariance ESO (Ecosystem Support Organization) is built leveraging ecosystem resources and onboarding new ones to provide support and value add to builders in the safe ecosystem.
Resilience through decentralization - Activating ecosystem participants serve this goal by helping motivate and identify opportunities the

Their success leads to more of their users and community using Safe.Bonus Question  - How does this proposal supports the overarching goals in the Safe constitution:Foster a vibrant ecosystem - the core design of the Covariance ESO (Ecosystem Support Organization) is built leveraging ecosystem resources and onboarding new ones to provide support and value add to builders in the safe ecosystem. Resilience through decentralization - Activating ecosystem participants serve this goal by helping motivate and identify opportunities the

content.text: The missing piece for Safe Ecosystem Grants Program
4. I understand that I will be required to provide additional KYC information to the Safe Foundation and to sign the KYC Agreement to receive this grant:
5. I understand that I have reviewed the
6. I understand that I will be expected to provide follow up grant reporting information to the Grants Council and Safe Forum

Covariance is growing a curated network of builders and business developer advocates who share a passion for unlocking value. We want to help projects solve well defined and measurable problems, by empowering contributors from varied networks to collaborate, ideate, and create value that otherwise would have not existed.
The Covariance model flow is simple:
- identify value proposition and their needs (KPI's)
(leverage Safe multi sig as a treasury for the campaign rewards)

We have identified, that a classic implementation of this general model fit in an Ecosystem Grant programs, where the foundation/ecosystem/DAO is seeding the "rewards", and the projects are the grantees. The goal is to provide grantees additional support beyond the funding to increase their chances of success and maximize the potential ROI for the ecosystem.
We propose to run an experiment of the Covariance model with Wave1 of the Safe grant program as a way to demonstrate the model.
What is the core value proposition of your project? Include details such as competitive analysis, comparable to similar projects and an emphasis on your key differentiators
The goal is to show the possibility of unlocking value in a scalable manner via the empowerment of community with structuring of incentive mechanism

The traditional support model today rely on the builders own network, or the networks in which they are member of (accelerators, VC's, local community or other parties of interest), and are usually limited or constrained by the capacity of the organization.
Covariance could be seen as Platform as a Service model, in which opportunities are proactively surfaced, and then any community member is able to help and get rewarded if value was created.

On the supply side, the value proposition for contributors is to leverage their network and expertise beyond the standard full-time hiring model, get an opportunity to expand their network , and get exposure to the projects they help.
More about the reasoning in the
, and in these references about the
Does your project use any novel technology?
We intend to leverage on chain reputation and credentials networks such as POAP, Galxe, web3 social (Lens, Farcaster, Cyeberconnect).
What type of support are you looking for?
Add additional context here to type of support required

At this phase of validation of the concept, we are mostly focused to demonstrate how proactive identification of needs and involvement of community in support can open up opportunities that add value. On this key premise what we will most need is the support of the Safe ecosystem and team in utilizing
Please share your key documents and links
Since the project officially just started recently, here are some references of past work to demonstrated capability to deliver:
Overall positive feedback in the Safe forum from the community:
Success demonstration in taking an idea to a working MVP (#1 hackathon winner of Ocean Protocol Data Economy Challenge

Initiated and led the first ever ETHTLV week while working at Collider Venture - demonstration of a building a community from 0 to 1 - > now 500+ members , organized 25+ community led events during the week
About us page with more background
The product is currently in bootstrap phase to demonstrate the value proposition.
Name and role of team member(s)
Lior Goldenberg, project founder, and a gradually growing closed & gated community of early trusted supporters.
Please share your educational and professional background, years active, including all relevant experience

I'm a crypto & web3 geek, autodidact with diverse background that went from a comfortable c-level position in a US global corporate, to become a builder, DAO maximalist, investor, and a web3 social maxi. Passionate about the future of work, on-chain reputation networks, and  these days an entrepreneur, building Covariance network

In my previous life (pre-crypto), I served as a CFO at the HQ of a division of a global corporate (HP), overseeing a P&L of >$200M annual revenue, leading strategy, planning and FP&A for the business.
Left corporate in 2018 and fell in love with web3 and into the DAO rabbit hole in 2019 with

, where I lead Finance Operation and Legal for the project. This is when I established my deep conviction and belief in crypto, the power of community, and the promise of the technology to solve coordination problems at scale.
Led the formation of a hackathon team, ideation and architecture design of a concept for decentralized dataset collective called
. Hacked and won 1st place at Ocean Data Economy Challenge
Evolved into D2D growth contributor and BD lead during the DeFi summer with multiple DAO’s and communities.
as Head of Platform, leading post investment portfolio support, where I worked with
and spent 100’s of hours reviewing deal flow, meeting founders and builders in diverse segments of the market.
Tell us your most notable achievement
Nominated as CFO of an HP subsidiary overseeing $200M Pnl at age 31. Helped turn around a business and secure $80M+ R&D investments over 5 years.
Helped early stage projects close strategic partnerships with top 30 crypto projects
Ideate a project, assembled a team and won 1st prize at an Hackathon
How long and under what circumstances have team members known each other, and worked together? If you do not have any team members, please put N/A
I'm leading the assembly and nurturing of the community around the vision of Covariance - building a community led organization that lives by these 3 core values -

The current community composition is build upon my personal network of trusted web3 builders I met along a 5 years crypto journey, who share similar values and deep belief in the power of community to unlock value.
Please share why you / your team has the right background(s) to bring this idea to market. Include any aspects like domain expertise, years of experience, or published research.

I've been working with founders and crypto projects in the past 5 years in multiple domains and segments of the market. I've gathered insights that shaped my passion to take what I've been doing and build a better model.

Throughout my journey, I kept seeing how tremendous value is captured just due to failure of coordination. How a simple intro or a random chat leads to big opportunities, and how so many others are just not coming into fruition due to lack of coordination or access to knowledge, resources, and network.
These all ended up with me leaving my full time job this summer and starting
, where I’m dedicating 100% of my time to solve this one critical problem I kept facing throughout my journey:

How to scale value add & unlock opportunities that do not materialize due to gaps in coordination. How can we open up participation to anyone that is capable of helping in identifying opportunities or finding a solution to another founder or project problem , and allow that value to emerge, while letting anyone involved get a fair share of the value created.

I’m convinced that similar to how DeFi rails has done for on-chain liquidity and price discovery, the future of work will be based on on-chain reputation & talent networks that will help talent and opportunities flow in a frictionless way that maximize value creation in the ecosystem.
More about my thoughts on this area:
Tell us about your product development journey. Be sure to describe your product development to date (if any).
Only applicable for Build and Growth grants. Please put N/A otherwise.
In order to experiment with the proposed model for ecosystem support organization, we will follow 4 phases, and focus on evaluating following key questions
Are we able to identify opportunities and support projects via activation of ecosystem members?
Do builders value the support they receive?
Tell us your plan of implementation for your project
Tell us about your traction to date. if not applicable, add N/A
Include revenue, users, partnerships, integrations, and/or feedback you've received and incorporated
Met 100+ founders, teams, investors, business developers, sales people, marketers and other ecosystem participants  to collect feedback.
Gathered a small community to bootstrap the supply side.
Gained interest to explore the model as a new investment vehicle (led by sweat equity)
In conversations with Identified design partners to implement various functions of the model (Legal framework design, tokenization of agreements, on chain infra and more)
Include Safe-related metrics: TVL, transactions, volume, unique addresses
Include links to Dune, Etherscan, or any relevant platform showcasing your metrics
Please share details of any fundraising (from self or external parties). Have you raised prior funds from VCs, investors, or government agencies?
Have you received any prior grants / hackathon winnings / accelerator funds?
Tell us about your long-term vision

Similar to how DeFi rails has done for on-chain liquidity and price discovery, the future of work will be based on on-chain reputation & talent networks that will help talent and opportunities flow in a frictionless way that maximize value creation in the ecosystem.
Covariance will utilize these primitives to become the go-to place for high quality and vetted builders to find curated opportunities for the problems they face.

Business developers, sales people and anyone that has built a personal network will find Covariance as the place to find quality opportunities to support and gain upside exposure from the value they helped created.
What would be your biggest obstacle to get there?
Please tell us what you think would be the biggest challenge faced in order to achieve your project aspirations.
The ability to bootstrap a strong network of contributors and demonstrate the value proposition early on (the classic cold-start problem)

Another challenge is to get enough contributors onboard in the reduced budget vs. original plan. (if the project could be extended with additional ~$10,000-$15,000, it will allow us to double down on the supply side and boost communication, outreach and exposure the experiment gets (exposure to Safe grants program as well)
Outline the major deliverables of your project. Please only provide major deliverables as you will have the chance to provide milestones in Section 3.
What is your estimated timeline for completion of the project?
What is the size of funding you expect for completing each milestone of the project?
The above request reflect 50% of the requested budget, and the other 50% was originally requested in $SAFE tokens.

Due to lack of transferability of the $SAFE token, but the criticality of including a long-term upside reward in the program to align contributors <> protocol incentives, we propose the same approach taken in SEP#6 proposal {i.e - contributors are not guaranteed additional rewards beside the allocated budget / bounties bucket, but assume good faith of the DAO to support a retroactive $SAFE and pending ratification)
resource allocation framework" option proposed in the forum -
Please identify the key milestones that will help track the progress of your grant.
12. Please map out your project milestones in the table below. These milestones will provide the Safe Grants Council and Safe community with progress updates of your project.
, we note what we mean by Benchmark vs Critical categories. We state
, which categories need what milestone e.g.{Research} grants only need critical milestones.
Dashboard of opportunities & needs, KPIs, rewards
Provide a comprehensive description of the tasks and deliverables for Milestone 1.
Specify the anticipated outcomes and their significance for the successful completion of the project.
Meet with grants committee members to gather feedback & highlights on their observation as for which projects are mostly in need of support
Onboarding interview and understanding of the needs of 10 chosen grantees.
Based on the previous stages, analyze and narrow down to a short list of proposed projects to focus on in Wave1
Review together with the Safe Grant Committee and decide - Filter down to
Break down the needs to clear & measurable KPI’s
Document a request for proposals (RFP) document for each project
Decide how to allocate the reward bucket to the various needs identified
- not part of the grants program  (to demonstrate the use case of supporting projects directly)
Build the dashboard of opportunities & needs, KPIs, rewards
Build and define the process to apply and contribute towards solving the opportunities
Interview 5-10 key stakeholders to identify resources in the safe ecosystem (list of people to be determined in collaboration with the grant council)
Research - Contribution Measurement framework - Research available tools to evaluate and measure contributions during the campaign
Research potential tools & communities to use and reach out in order to echo the builders needs (map where and how we can best echo the needs identified to find relevant matches)
Promotion - Invite safe ecosystem members to participate in the experiment as contributors
Promotion - Invite external members of the community
Provide a comprehensive description of the tasks and deliverables for Milestone 2
Specify the anticipated outcomes and their significance for the successful completion of the project.
Launch of submission window for contributors
Actively push in the previously identified tools and communities to encourage submissions of opportunities for the KPI's
Resolution - Projects received the opportunities submitted and evaluate if they meet their expectations
Build an NPS conclusion survey to assess the success of the experiement
How are you planning to build or improve  Safe?
Develop an innovative use case for Safe vaults - every Covariance campaign is a potential vault, in which the potential rewards are locked and distributed to contributors upon completion
Demonstrating a new community-led support model that can help scale SGP and unlock opportunities to help grantees
Position the Safe Ecosystem Grants program as an innovative lighthouse for other ecosystem to adopt and learn from.
Try to detail out the plan to leverage the power of the Safe Ecosystem.

Upon mapping of needs on the grantees side, we will be looking to get as much exposure to the opportunity for community members to participate in helping them meet their KPI's. in order to do that we will be looking to
Present the opportunities on a community call.
Post on the forum or use the Safe ecosystem social accounts and other mediums to get as much exposure to the opportunities as possible
Why will this solution be a source of growth for the Safe ecosystem?
Because it works on both sides of the ecosystem:
It will allow Covariance to deliver more campaigns and continue build on Safe
It will encourage more builders to build similar models using Safe.
It will empower existing community to engage and support other builders in the ecosystem
It will bring new members that might find opportunities to contribute within the safe ecosystem
How does your project relate to account abstraction and smart accounts?

The core model of Covariance is built upon launching "campaign" - each campaign include several projects allocating rewards and locking them into a smart account, that under certain condition, unlocked and be distributed to contributors.

we support builders and help increase their chances of success. Their success leads to more of their users and community using Safe.
supports the overarching goals in the Safe constitution:

- the core design of the Covariance ESO (Ecosystem Support Organization) is built leveraging ecosystem resources and onboarding new ones to provide support and value add to builders in the safe ecosystem.

1. looking to consult on our product tech stack design
2. Looking to speak with potential design partners to use our solution
